simple_surf.name: Simple Surface
simple_surf.description: Simple Surface shows a surface representation with slight subsurface scattering, fog that fades to white, ambient occlusion, HDR lighting, and depth-of-field blur.
simple_surf.colorScheme: Carbon, oxygen, nitrogen, sulfur, and hydrogen atoms are shown in silver, red, blue, yellow, and white, respectively. Support for other elements is limited.

misc.notes: all these with unet_128, not unet_256

chalk_shadow.name: Chalky Shadow
chalk_shadow.description: Chalky Shadow shows a surface representation with fog that fades to white, ambient occlusion, studio lighting, depth-of-field blur, and cast shadows.
chalk_shadow.colorScheme: All atoms are rendered in chalky white.

misc.notes: all these with unet_128, not unet_256

chalk.name: Chalky
chalk.description: Chalky shows a surface representation with fog that fades to white, ambient occlusion, studio lighting, and depth-of-field blur. Unlike Chalky Shadow, there are no cast shadows.
chalk.colorScheme: All atoms are rendered in chalky white.

misc.notes: all these with unet_128, not unet_256
